unit.name: Dreadlord
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour.

unit.name: Supreme Sorceress
unit.description: Magic: A Supreme Sorceress is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour.

unit.name: Master
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour.

unit.name: Death Hag
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapon. Special Rules: Eternal Hatred, Frenzy, Poisoned Attacks (1).

unit.name: Sorceress
unit.description: Magic: A Sorceress is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon.

unit.name: Assassin
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapon. Special Rules: Eternal Hatred, Scout, ASF, Concealed, No Leader.

unit.name: Beastmaster
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour, Special Rules: Beastmaster.

unit.name: Warriors
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: AP (1).

unit.name: Spearmen
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Anti-Cav (spear).

unit.name: Corsair
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons, light armour and Sea Dragon Cloak. Special Rules: Slavers.

unit.name: Raider
unit.description: Equipment: Handbows, light armour and Sea Dragon Cloak. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Slavers.

unit.name: Harpy
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Skirmishers, Beasts.

unit.name: Repeater Crossbowmen
unit.description: Equipment: Repeater Crossbow and light armour.

unit.name: Dark Rider
unit.description: Mount: Dark Steed. Equipment: Spear and light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

equipment.name: Shields (loses the Light Cavalry special rule)

unit.name: Cold One Knight
unit.description: Mount: Cold One. Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Thick-skinned, Fear, Stupidity.

unit.name: Cold One Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 Crew, 2 Cold Ones. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears and repeater crossbows. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Stupidity.

unit.name: Scourgerunner Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Crew, 2 Dark Steeds. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears, repeater crossbows and one Light Bolt Thrower. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1).

unit.name: Executioner
unit.description: Equipment: Draich and heavy armour. Special Rules: Killing Blow.

unit.name: Witch Elf
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Frenzy, Poisoned Attacks (1).

unit.name: Shade
unit.description: Equipment: Repeater Crossbow and light armour. Special Rules: Scout, Skirmish

unit.name: Black Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd and heavy armour. Special Rules: Stubborn, Immune to Psychology, Eternal Hatred.

unit.name: Sisters of Slaughter
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Skirmish, Dodge (5+), Immune to Psychology, Fear.

unit.name: War Hydra
unit.description: Monster: 1 War Hydra and 2 Beast Handler. Equipment: Additional hand weapon (Beast Handler only). Special Rules (War Hydra): Fiery Breath, Scaly Skin (5+), Large Target, Terror, Regeneration (4+), Hatred (Beast Handlers only).

unit.name: Kharibdyss
unit.description: Monster: 1 Kharibdyss and 2 Beast Handler. Equipment: Additional hand weapon (Beast Handler only). Special Rules (Kharibdyss): Poisoned Attacks (1), Large Target, Terror, Hatred (Beast Handlers only).

unit.name: Repeater Bolt Thrower
unit.description: Warmachine: 2 Crew. Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Repeater Bolt Thrower.

unit.name: Bloodwrack Medusa
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Scout, Fear, March Blocker, Poisoned Attacks (1), Medusas Gaze.

unit.name: Doomfire Warlock
unit.description: Mount: Dark Steed. Equipment: Hand weapons. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Poisoned Attacks (1), Fear, Immune to Psychology, Ward Save (5+), Warlocks.

unit.name: Cauldron of Blood
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 1 Witch Hag and 2 Guardians. Equipment: Additional hand weapon. Special Rules: Frenzy, Terror, Large Target, Poisoned Attacks (1), MR1, Blood Aura, Blood Fury PM 3/7+.

unit.name: Doomsteed
unit.description: Mount: Barded Dark Steed, Equipment: Spear and light armour (looses spear on Repater Crossbow)

mount.name: Cold One
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Thick-skinned, Stupidity, Fear.

mount.name: Dark Pegasus
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker, Impale (1).

mount.name: Manticore
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Killing Blow, Uncontrollable.

mount.name: Black Dragon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (3+), Noxious Breath.

mount.name: Cold One Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 Crew, 2 Cold Ones. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears and repeater crossbows. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Stupidity.

mount.name: Scourgerunner Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Crew, 2 Dark Steeds. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears, repeater crossbows and one Light Bolt Thrower. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1).

item.name: Armour of Darkness
item.description: Armour includes a Shield and grants an AS of 1+ that may not be improved.

item.name: Armour of Eternal Servitude
item.description: Light Armour, Regeneration (4+)

item.name: Armour of Living Death
item.description: Heavy Armour, bearer gains +1T and +1W

item.name: BM Black Horror
item.description: (13+) Direct Damage, Range 18”, 5” template, S5, no AS. Target a point within the target unit. If the target point is out of range, the spell has no effect. If the target point is within range, place the template with its center over the target point and resolve it. A unit that suffers one or more casualties, must take a panic test.

item.name: BM Chill Wind
item.description: (6+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS until casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Dominion
item.description: (10+) Hex, Range 18". - Choose effect A), B) or C): - A) In its next movment phase, target unit cannot charge and may only reform but not move otherwise. - B) In its next magic phase, target unit cannot cast spells. - C) In its next shooting phase, target unit cannot use ranged attacks.

item.name: BM Doombolt
item.description: (7+) MM, Range 18", D6 S5 hits

item.name: BM Soul Stealer
item.description: (10+) Direct Damage, Range 12", 5" template, S3, no AS. Target a point within the target unit. If the target point is out of range, the spell has no effect. If the target point is within range, place the template with its center over the target point and resolve it. If the spell causes at least one wound (wounds saved with ward saves do not count but wounds regained by regeneration do) the caster gains 1 wound up to a max. of double its original W.

item.name: BM Word of Pain
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 24", target units WS and BS is reduced to 1 until casters next magic phase

item.name: Banner of Murder
item.description: All Dark Elves in the unit gain AP(1) for cc attacks. If the unit already has AP then the AP value is increased by 1.

item.name: Banner of Nagarythe
item.description: Bearer and his unit gain Stubborn and +1CR. Further, friendly regiments of Dark Elves (i.e. no single models and no non- Dark Elves like Harpies) within 6" gain +1CR.

item.name: Beastmaster
item.description: Harpies, Hydras and Kharibdysses within 6" of the Beastmaster reroll failed Ld-Tests.

item.name: Beasts
item.description: The unit has to use its own Ld value for all Ld-Test.

item.name: Black Amulet
item.description: 5+ Ward Save in cc only, if passed rebounds wounds with no AS

item.name: Black Dragon Egg
item.description: At the start of any turn of any player the model can consume the egg to gain S6, T6 and the Noxious Breath special rule until the end of that turn. One use only.

item.name: Black Lotus
item.description: If the bearer kills a model in a challenge, all wounds caused count double for CR (up to the max. for overkill)

item.name: Black Staff
item.description: There is no maximum to the number of PD that the bearer can use to cast BM spells.

item.name: Blade of Ruin
item.description: no AS

item.name: Blades of Dark Poison
item.description: Additional hand weapon, Poisoned Attacks (3)

item.name: Blades of Spite
item.description: Additional hand weapon, To-hit rolls of a natural 6 wound automatically.

item.name: Blood Armour
item.description: Heavy Armour, for every unsaved wound the bearer inflicts in cc (before regeneration), its AS is improved by 1 point up to 1+ until the end of the game. If mounted, the model never counts as heavy cav.

item.name: Blood Aura
item.description: The Cauldron gets a 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells. All Witch Elves within 12" (including the Cauldron) get a 6+ Ward Save and cannot lose Frenzy. Witch Elves within 12" regain Frenzy.

item.name: Chill Blade
item.description: Every time a model is wounded by this weapon it has to pass a T-test. If the test is failed no AS is allowed for this wound. Any model wounded may not attack for the rest of this combat phase

item.name: Cloak of Twilight
item.description: Models on foot only. 3+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells.

item.name: Concealed
item.description: Instead of deploying this model during setup, it can start the game concealed in any Dark Elf infantry. No more than one model can be hidden in a unit. An Assassin does not count to the limit of character models per unit but no more than one Assassin may be part of a unit (hidden or not) at any time. The DE player may reveal the Assassin at the start of any of his turns or at the start of any combat phase. When the Assassin is revealed place it in btb with the enemy (cc) or in the front rank of the unit (when the unit is not in cc). If possible, a model of the unit is placed in the back of the unit to make space, if not a character model may be moved. If the unit, the Assassin is hiding in, is destroyed before the Assassin is revealed, the Assassin is lost and counts as a casualty. A concealed Assassin cannot be damaged in any kind of way.

item.name: Crimson Death
item.description: Two-handed, +2S, Killing Blow

item.name: Crown of Black Iron
item.description: 5+ Ward Save, MR 1

item.name: Cry of War
item.description: Unit charged by this model has to pass a Ld-test or suffers -1WS until the end of turn

item.name: Crystal of Midnight
item.description: At the start of your turn nominate one wizard on the table that has to pass a Ld-test on 3D6 or loses one random BM spell for the rest of the game. One use only.

item.name: Dance of Doom
item.description: 5+ Ward Save

item.name: Dark Venom
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (1)

item.name: Darkstar Cloak
item.description: +1 Power Dice every magic phase, may only be used by the bearer.

item.name: Deathmask
item.description: Bearer causes Terror

item.name: Disciple of Khaine
item.description: The model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Draich (Executioner Blade)
Draich
item.description: Two-handed weapon, +2S

item.name: Dread Banner
item.description: Unit causes Fear.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Eternal Hatred
item.description: The model/unit hates all enemies and re-rolls all failed tohit rolls in every cc round.

item.name: Fiery Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S3

item.name: Gauntlet of Power
item.description: S8, no AS, Always Strike Last

item.name: Gem of Nightmares
item.description: At the start of any turn of any player the model can use the gem to cause Fear until the end of turn. If the model is part of a unit, the unit also causes Fear. One use only.

item.name: Hand of Khaine
item.description: Single model in btb loses 1A. DE player may choose which model and which attack. Has no effect on models that are immune to psychology.

item.name: Handbow
Handbows
item.description: Range 8", S3, no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always stand and shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance.

item.name: Heart Stone of Darkness
item.description: 4+ Ward Save

item.name: Heartseeker
item.description: Bearer rerolls failed to-wound rolls.

item.name: Hydra Banner
item.description: In each first combat round all Dark Elves in the unit with this banner gain +1A.

item.name: Hydra Blade
item.description: +D3 A, roll each combat phase for number of attacks

item.name: Lifetaker
item.description: Range 24", S3, AP(1), Multiple Shots (3), always hits on a 2+

item.name: Light Bolt Thrower
item.description: Range 36", S5, penetrates ranks, no Stand & Shoot, Large Targets suffer 2 wounds, only one model is needed to operate the weapon, i.e. other models are free to use missile weapons in the shooting phase (but remember that the whole model has to shoot at the same target).

item.name: Manbane
item.description: Weapons count as having S at one higher than targets T (up to a max of 6), which also modifies AS.

item.name: Medusas Gaze
item.description: Shooting Attack, Range 12", S3, no AS, Multiple Shots (3), Sniper

item.name: Mystic Shield of Light
item.description: 5+ Ward Save, if a wound is saved in cc by this ward save the attacking models WS is reduced to 1 until the end of this combat phase

item.name: Nagarythe Hatred
item.description: All Dark Elves hate all of their enemies, including other Dark Elves.

item.name: No Leader
item.description: This model may never be the army general. Also units cannot use this models Ld for Ld-tests and this model does not allow a unit to rally below 25%.

item.name: Noxious Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S3, Poisoned Attacks (1). In addition, units that suffered casualties but are not Immune to Psychology, have to pass a Ld-Test to be able to declare a charge in the following turn. Slavers: Roll an additional dice when this unit pursues an enemy and discard the lowest.

item.name: PM Blood Fury 2/7+
PM Blood Fury 3/7+
Blood Fury PM 3/7+
item.description: All Dark Elves within 12" reroll to-wound rolls of natural 1s in cc. All Witch Elves within 12" (including the Cauldron) reroll failed to-wound rolls in cc. The effect lasts until the casters next magic phase. This spell cannot be lost through a miscast.

item.name: PM Dark Fury 2/5+
PM Dark Fury 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls to-wound rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Shroud of Darkness 2/5+
PM Shroud of Darkness 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: PM Steed of Shadows 2/4+
PM Steed of Shadows 3/4+
item.description: Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: Potion of Strength
item.description: Use at the start of any cc phase. The model gains +3S until the end of turn. One use only.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Repeater Bolt Thrower
item.description: Every time you like to fire this weapon choose one of the following fire modes: Single Bolt: Range 48", S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks, Volley Shot: Range 48", S4, AP (1). Fires 5 shots that are resolved separately and suffer no penalty for multiple shots.

item.name: Repeater Crossbow
item.description: Range 24", S3, Multiple Shots (2)

item.name: Ring of Darkness
item.description: PM 2/5+, the bearer can only be hit by natural 6s in cc. Lasts until the next casters magic phase.

item.name: Ring of Hotek
item.description: Any magic user (friend or foe) within 12" miscast if they roll any double. Double 6s result in spells to be cast with irresistible force and the caster suffers a miscast.

item.name: Rune of Khaine
item.description: +D3 A, roll each combat phase for number of attacks

item.name: Sacrificial Dagger
item.description: Once per magic phase, after the casting dice are rolled, but before a dispel attempt is made, the bearer of this item can sacrifice one model in her unit. Chose which model is removed from the game (no saves of any kind or regeneration allowed), then roll a D6. On a 4+, immediately roll an additional (free) PD and add the result to the casting roll (may cause IF or a miscast). On a roll of 3 or less, no PD is generated but you can continue to sacrifice models in the way described above until you succeed or stop at any time and accept the original casting roll. If the unit suffers 25% or more casualties in this way the unit has to take a panic test.

item.name: Sea Dragon Banner
item.description: The unit is subject to Frenzy.

item.name: Sea Dragon Cloak
item.description: The model gets +1AS vs CC attacks and +2AS vs ranged attacks.

item.name: Seal of Ghrond
item.description: +1 DD

item.name: Shield of Ghrond
item.description: Shield, any hits against the bearer are resolved at -1S

item.name: Single Bolt
item.description: Range 48", S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks

item.name: Soulstone
item.description: Immune to effects of first miscast (BM or PM).

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Standard of Slaughter
item.description: Unit gains +D3 CR during its first successful charge (i.e. there is a combat) in the game. The bonus only counts for the first combat round.

item.name: Thick-skinned
item.description: Mount grants +2AS instead of +1AS

item.name: Touch of Death
item.description: Model gains KB for cc attacks

item.name: Uncontrollable
item.description: If the model is not engaged in cc, it has to pass as Ld-Test in the Start of the Turn phase. If the test is failed the model suffers from Frenzy until it passes its Uncontrollable test or loses combat. Note that it is possible for the model to regain Frenzy even if it lost it in cc before.

item.name: Venom Sword
item.description: causes D3 wounds

item.name: Volley Shot
item.description: Range 48", S4, AP (1). Fires 5 shots that are resolved separately and suffer no penalty for multiple shots.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Warlocks
item.description: This unit may cast one of the following spells in each magic phase: - Doomfire (PM 2/5+): MM, Range 18", for each model in the Warlocks unit the target suffers 1 S3 hit - Doomforce (PM 2/3+): Augment, self, the unit gains +1S until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Web of Shadows
item.description: Can be used in cc instead of attacking normally. One (single) model in btb contact suffers 2D6 S3 hits. One use only.

item.name: Witchbrew
item.description: At the start of any turn the model may administer the Witchbrew to a unit of Witch Elves that the model has joined. Until the end of the game, enemies gain no bonuses for outnumbering, flank or rear attacks (ranks are still lost if the flanking units US is 5+) and high ground when fighting a unit under the influence of Witchbrew. One use only.
